name: The Nature
description: (NOT A MOBILE GAME PORT or NOT AN RPG MAKER GAME!!!) You are a creature just like others. You have the same needs, the same abilities. There is just one difference; you can talk with the Spirit of The Nature. Gather items, craft weapons, achieve your dreams, start a family, form a party and complete the quests without dying.
minimum_requirements: 最低配置: 操作系统: 7/8/10 处理器: Pentium Dual Core G860 内存: 512 MB RAM 图形: DirectX 9 Compatible DirectX 版本: 9.0c 存储空间: 需要 100 MB 可用空间
recommended_requirements: 推荐配置: 操作系统: 10
